compatibility_d: PDF Version to render output in
colorProfile_d: Color Profile to use for color conversion when rendering PDF files
embedIccProfile_d: Embed the ICC profile into the rendered PDF files as Output Intent (PDF 2.0, PDF/A and PDF/X only)
renderSpotColors_d: Retain Spot name colors in the output file
renderInvisibleLayers_d: Render layers even if they are set to invisible in the design
downsampleImages_d: Downsample images above the specified DPI to target DPI
convertImageColorSpace_d: Convert images to the specified color space selected above (Color Profile) when rendering PDF files
jpegQuality_d: JPEG quality for rendered images in the PDF files
honorImageIccProfile_d: Honor an ICC profile which may be available in the image in the final PDF rendering
embedIccProfileInImages_d: Embed the profile-based ICC profile into images when rendering PDF files
interpolateImages_d: Enables image interpolation to improve the appearance on screen and paper
imageRenderingIntent_d: Rendering intent to use when converting images to the target color space
embedFonts_d: Embed fonts used in the design into the rendered PDF files
subsetFonts_d: Subset fonts when embedding into the rendered PDF files
requirePassword_d: Require password to open the rendered PDF files
includeScreenshot_d: This will include a screenshot capture of the canvas in your PDF. Please turn this OFF if you don't need it.
flattenFonts_d: Convert fonts to vector shapes in the output PDF
renderMarks_d: Render printer's marks like Bleed, Trim, Margin and Fold marks in the output PDF
userPassword_d: Password to open the PDF file. Passwords will not work for PDF versions lower than 1.6 or PDF/A and PDF/X standards
